ceo_buyer.justification: The acquiring company is Golden Horse. The text states: 'Golden Horse's Managing Director & CEO Nicholas Anderson commented...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The first highlight states: 'Golden Horse has entered a conditional Sale Agreement...to acquire 100% of its Bullfinch Gold Project.'

currency.justification: The payment terms are specified with an 'A$' prefix: 'A$250,000 cash payment upon transfer of the tenure...'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of the upfront and milestone payments, per the aggregation rule. 'Terms of the transaction include: A$250,000 cash payment upon transfer of the tenure; and A$200,000 milestone cash payment upon the delineation of a 100,000oz JORC resource...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The document does not mention any consideration in the form of shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The payment is explicitly defined as cash only, so this field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The document does not mention any shares being issued as part of the consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The document does not specify a drilling or exploration commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The document does not specify a monetary exploration commitment as part of the agreement.

exploration_commitment_desc.justification: While future exploration is mentioned ('We are eager to commence further exploration...'), no specific, binding commitment is detailed as part of the transaction terms.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The document does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of the agreement.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The document states: 'The Sale Agreement provides Golden Horse an additional 422km2 of tenure...' and 'The Bullfinch tenement area covers 422km2...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is specified in the text: 'The Bullfinch tenement area covers 422km2...'

resource_size_desc.justification: The document does not provide a JORC or other formal mineral resource estimate for the Bullfinch project. It mentions historical production grades (e.g., '35.7 g/t gold') and a future resource delineation goal, which do not constitute an existing resource.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The document header identifies the buyer as 'Golden Horse Minerals Ltd Che Interest(GHM:AU)', indicating an Australian listing. The price data is also quoted in AUD.
